text:
Transfix - New York, NY - Onsite Full-Time Looking for: Data Lead (build our data warehouse from scratch) Front-End Engineers Back-End Engineers

We're reinventing trucking logistics by creating an on-demand marketplace for shippers and drivers. We're well funded (we raised $22M for our Series B) and the engineering team has been going through some really exciting growth!

Tech Stack: Aurelia.js, Ruby on Rails, Postgresql, AWS

We're looking for mid-senior (3+ yrs of exp.) engineers to build out RESTful services, improve parallelization with asynchronous services, create data visualization, and help transition us fully to a SaaS platform.

Interview process: Recruiter Screen (30m) > Tech Screen (1-1.5hrs) > On-site Interview (3hrs)

If interested, you can reach out to me directly at michelle@transfix.io
